Description:
Number of VM creations or deployment activities occur in Azure via the azureactivity log.

Author: sawwinnnaung
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Number Of Resource Creation Or Deployment Activities
Query: sourcetype='azure-activitylogs' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%microsoft.compute/virtualmachines/write%' or log like '%microsoft.resources/deployments/write%')
